hero.title: Enter the world of Les Crêtes to taste our wines and visit our cellar.

intro.p: The Rifugio del Vino is a real terrace on the vineyards overlooking the city of Aosta, a place where hospitality is at home and where you can live a unique experience. The tastings are dedicated to both groups and individual eno-fans.

Each tasting is accompanied by a visit to the cellar, available in various ways, depending on your preferences. If you have special needs for yourself or your group, contact us to create your personalized visit.

cards.title: 3 Wines Experience
cards.descrizione: Tasting of three wines at the Wine Refuge and visit to the cellar and the wine cellar

cards.title: 5 Wines Experience
cards.descrizione: Tasting of 5 wines from the territory at the wine refuge in the cellar and barricaia

cards.title: Wine and Cheese Experience
cards.descrizione: Tasting of 5 selected wines in combination with 6 local cheeses and visit to the cellar and barricaia

cards.title: Top Wines Experience
cards.descrizione: Tasting of 5 top wines accompanied by a cutting board of the local gastronomy and visit to the cellar and barricaia

cards.title: Côteau la Tour Experience
cards.descrizione: Tasting of 5 wines accompanied by a cutting board of the local gastronomy and visit in the cellar and barricaia. Tour of the Côteau vineyard and toast in the Medieval Tower

cards.title: Winemaker's Experience
cards.descrizione: Discover the world of Les Crêtes, told by our wine maker Raffaele, from the vineyards to the cellar.

cards.title: Wellness & Wine Tasting
cards.descrizione: One night stay in a double room at QC Terme Spas & Resorts, with wellness path + tasting of 5 selected wines with 6 local cheeses, visit to the cellar and barricaia.

trewines.name: 3 Wines Experience
trewines.title: trewines
trewines.cardDesc: Tasting of three wines at the Wine Refuge and visit to the cellar and the wine cellar

descrizione.title: Description
descrizione.content: Take a first step into the world of Les Crêtes to discover its history, territory, vines and wines. In the suggestive setting of the Rifugio del Vino, you can taste three wines with a view over the vineyards, after visiting the cellar and the wine cellar.

lista.testo: - Tasting of 3 wines
- Visit of the cellar and barricaia

form.gift: You want to give a gift?

fivewines.name: 5 Wines Experience
fivewines.title: native
fivewines.cardDesc: Tasting of 5 wines from the territory at the wine refuge in the cellar and barricaia

descrizione.title: Description
descrizione.content: Experience a journey in the world of wine Les Crêtes that from native wines goes back to history, to the territory, to its ancestral vines. In the setting of the Wine Refuge, after visiting the cellar and the barricaia, You will taste the local wines with a view of the vineyards and you can choose to combine them with our selection of charcuterie and cheeses from the local gastronomy.

lista.testo: - Tasting of 5 wines
- Visit of the cellar and barricaia

opzione.title: As an option with this tasting:
opzione.uno: Our selection of cold cuts and cheeses from the local gastronomy at an additional cost of € 14.00 pax incl.

form.gift: You want to give a gift?

cheese.name: Wine and Cheese Experience
cheese.title: cheese
cheese.cardDesc: Tasting of 5 selected wines in combination with 6 local cheeses and visit to the cellar and barricaia

descrizione.title: Description
descrizione.content: Enter the world of Les Crêtes to discover its history, the territory and its vines in a gastronomic journey that sees wine and cheese as protagonists. In the suggestive setting of the Rifugio del Vino you can taste a selection of our wines, each in combination with a fine local cheese, accompanied by mountain honey.

lista.testo: - Tasting of 5 selected wines with 6 local cheeses *
- Visit of the cellar and barricaia

descrizione.asterisco: *The wines indicated are subject to change according to availability

form.gift: You want to give a gift?

top.name: Top Wines Experience
top.title: top
top.cardDesc: Tasting of 5 top wines accompanied by a cutting board of the local gastronomy and visit to the cellar and barricaia

descrizione.title: Description
descrizione.content: For wine lovers and experts, 5 prestigious Les Crêtes labels to taste in the setting of the Rifugio del Vino, enjoying, with a view over the vineyards, The pairing of a selection of charcuterie and fine cheeses from local gastronomy, after the dedicated guided tour.

lista.testo: - Tasting of 5 top wines agreed with our Sommelier *
- Visit of the cellar and barricaia
- Our selection of local delicacies and cheeses

descrizione.asterisco: *The wines indicated are subject to change according to availability

form.gift: You want to give a gift?

tour.name: Côteau la Tour Experience
tour.title: tour
tour.cardDesc: Tasting of 5 wines accompanied by a cutting board of the local gastronomy and visit in the cellar and barricaia. Tour of the Côteau vineyard and toast in the Medieval Tower

visita.title: Winery tour
visita.cantina: yes + visit to the vineyards of Côteau la Tour

descrizione.title: Description
descrizione.content: Travel through the world of Les Crêtes, immersing yourself in the colours, scents and history of the Côteau la Tour vineyard, guarded by its medieval tower that dominates the landscape, Unveiling a breathtaking view. In the suggestive setting of the Rifugio del Vino, you can also taste wines paired with our selection of local salami and cheese.

lista.testo: - Tasting of 5 selected wines with 6 local cheeses *
- Visit of the cellar and barricaia
- Visit to the vineyards of Côteau la Tour with toast in the Medieval Tower (recommended the use of comfortable shoes)
- Board of cold cuts and cheeses from the local gastronomy

descrizione.asterisco: *The wines indicated are subject to change according to availability

form.gift: You want to give a gift?

winemaker.name: Winemaker's Experience
winemaker.title: winemaker
winemaker.cardDesc: Discover the world of Les Crêtes, told by our wine maker Raffaele, from the vineyards to the cellar.

degustazione.title: Tasting
degustazione.vini: 5 wines + local cold cuts and cheeses

descrizione.title: Description
descrizione.content: Discover the world of Les Crêtes, told by our wine maker Raffaele, from the vineyards to the cellar following the path that leads our grapes to the bottle. In the suggestive setting of the Rifugio del Vino, you will taste wines chosen with the winemaker, combined with a selection of cold cuts and cheeses from local gastronomy.

lista.testo: - Tasting of 5 wines chosen with the winemaker
- Visit to the cellar and barrel tasting
- Visit to the vineyard (recommended wearing comfortable shoes)
- Selection of local salami and cheese

form.gift: You want to give a gift?

wellness.name: Wellness & Wine Tasting
wellness.title: wellness
wellness.cardDesc: One night stay in a double room at QC Terme Spas & Resorts, with wellness path + tasting of 5 selected wines with 6 local cheeses, visit to the cellar and barricaia.

degustazione.title: Tasting
degustazione.vini: 5 wines + local cold cuts and cheeses

descrizione.title: Description
descrizione.content: Immerse yourself in the charm of an authentic culinary tradition, where genuine flavors are the undisputed protagonists. The Aosta Valley is a true paradise for lovers of good food and wine, with the possibility to taste excellent local wines. And to make your stay even more memorable, treat yourself to a suggestive wellness path, surrounded by panoramic baths and cozy relaxation rooms.

lista.testo: - Stay in double room and rich breakfast
- Entrance to the hotel wellness path directly from your room in a bathrobe
- Tasting of 5 selected wines paired with 6 local cheeses at the Les Crêtes winery

wellness.prenotaTitle: The booking for this tasting with wellness path is made directly on the platform of the QC Terme hotel.

prenota.title: Book your visit now or ask for information about the tastings:

list.name: - Fill in the form on the page of the chosen tasting

faq.question: I am gluten intolerant, can I ask for a dedicated plate/cutting board?
faq.answer: For intolerances/allergies please inform us at the time of booking and we will create a special assortment for you.

faq.question: Can I take my dog to the tasting?
faq.answer: Dogs are welcome at the Wine Refuge and can accompany you during the tastings. However, they will not be able to access the cellars for the company visit.

faq.question: Is there parking available in front of the hotel?
faq.answer: We offer a large square in front of the Wine Hut where you can park your vehicles.

faq.question: Can I reach you by public transport?
faq.answer: The farm can be reached on line 5 from Aosta. Buses leave from the square in front of the train station, same for taxis to contact on +39 0165 262010.

faq.question: Do you have a parking area for your camper?
faq.answer: The company does not regulate this service. The parking area for campers is located in front of the post office of Aymavilles (Frazione Chef Lieu, 24, 11010 Aymavilles - AO).

faq.question: Is the property accessible to disabled people?
faq.answer: The property offers ramps for disabled people. They can visit the cellars with a lift.

faq.question: Are groups allowed in?
faq.answer: They are admitted upon availability of the structure. The reservation must be made well in advance (at least two weeks before the selected date).

faq.question: Is there a children’s area?
faq.answer: We propose a children’s space within the structure to give the little ones a moment of leisure and play during the tasting routes.

faq.question: Can I take the kids to a wine tasting?
faq.answer: Children can access the structure and we guarantee non-alcoholic proposals as well as the space for children.

faq.question: If I have an unexpected event, can I change the day of the tasting?
faq.answer: It is possible to change the day of the tasting by giving two days - no later than - notice from the selected date.

faq.question: Are the tastings also suitable for vegetarians or vegans?
faq.answer: The tasting of wines is free and dedicated to anyone although instead of the cutting board we will offer galettes as an accompaniment.

faq.question: Is it possible to give away a tasting?
faq.answer: You can give an experience to Les Crêtes with your voucher (gift certificate). Please contact us at the email address (ordini@lescretes.it) to regulate the payment of the voucher after the balance of the experience by bank transfer.

faq.question: What is the maximum capacity for a tasting? Is advance booking required?
faq.answer: Our structure can accommodate up to 50 people and a reservation is necessary at least two weeks in advance from the selected date.

faq.question: Is it possible to ship the wines?
faq.answer: It is possible to arrange a shipment by sending the request to the mail address ordini@lescretes.it.

faq.question: Is it a structure that offers lunches and dinners?
faq.answer: The Rifugio del Vino does not provide for the discipline of meals but offers emotional tasting experiences to which, upon request, assortments of cheeses and cold cuts can be added.

banner.title: Il Rifugio del Vino: emotional tasting room
banner.paragraph: A place where hospitality is at home and where you can live a unique experience in the mountains of Valle d'Aosta.
